description.name: SESAR
description.title: A format compatible with SESAR
description.description: A sample template based on SESAR

object_type.label: Object Type
object_type.description: Object type of sample. If object type is Individual Sample or Experimental Specimen, user may elect to enter a sub-object type (see below).

user_code.label: User code
user_code.description: User code to be used as prefix for IGSNs to be assigned or assigned by user in the submitted batch template.
notes: Please supply the user code to be used to assign IGSNs. If user assigns IGSNs in the IGSN column, the user code must match the user code in the IGSNs. For example, if the user specifies IEMEG is the user code, any user-specified IGSNs must begin with IEMEG. If a user does not specify the user code to be used, a default user code belonging to the registrant will be used.

age_min.label: Age (min)
age_min.description: Numerical value for the maximum age of a sample

age_max.label: Age (max)
age_max.description: Numerical value for the minimum age of a sample

city_township.label: City/Township
city_township.description: City or Township where the sample was collected

classification.label: Classification
classification.description: Taxonomy (formal classification) Formal categorization of sample.

collection_date.label: Collection date
collection_date.description: Date when the sample was collected.

collection_date_end.label: Collection date (end)
collection_date_end.description: Date when the sample collection was finished (if a date range is provided).

collection_date_precision.label: Collection date precision
collection_date_precision.description: Precision to display the collection date and time.

collection_method.label: Collection method
collection_method.description: Method by which a sample was collected

collection_method_description.label: Collection method description
collection_method_description.description: Additional information about the collection method

collection_time.label: Collection time
collection_time.description: Time when the sample was collected.

collection_time_end.label: Collection time (end)
collection_time_end.description: Time when the sample was collected.

collector_chief_scientist.label: Collector/Chief Scientist name
collector_chief_scientist.description: Name of the person who collected the sample. In case of larger field programs, name of chief scientist responsible for  sample collection.

collector_chief_scientist_address.label: Collector/Chief Scientist address
collector_chief_scientist_address.description: Institution, address, & email of the collector or chief scientist.

comment.label: Comment
comment.description: Free text to add any comments pertaining to the sample

country.label: Country
country.description: Country where the sample was collected

county.label: County
county.description: County where the sample was collected

current_archive.label: Current archive
current_archive.description: Name of institution, museum, or repository where the sample is currently stored.

current_archive_contact.label: Current archive contact name
current_archive_contact.description: Address and/or email of the person who should be contacted for information about or access to the sample.

depth_in_core_max.label: Depth in Core (max)
depth_in_core_max.description: Maximum depth at which a sample was collected from its parent core

depth_in_core_min.label: Depth in Core (min)
depth_in_core_min.description: Minimum depth at which a sample was collected from its parent core

depth_scale.label: Depth scale
depth_scale.description: Unit in which the depth is provided
notes: sesar spec does not provide a controlled list for this!

easting.label: Easting
easting.description: Geographic Cartesian coordinate of where the sample was collected, in meters, as in UTM. "305294‚Äù

elevation_end.label: Elevation end
elevation_end.description: To be geolocated in the SESAR system, latitude and longitude must be filled out. UTM coordinates can be specified for reference but will not place the sample on the map. There are several web tools for converting from UTM to latitude/longitude, such as http://www.earthpoint.us/Convert.aspx.

elevation_start.label: Elevation start
elevation_start.description: Elevation at which a sample was collected. Use negative values for depth below sea level. Minimum elevation if a range is provided for the elevation/depth below sea level.

elevation_unit.label: Elevation unit
elevation_unit.description: Unit in which elevation start and/or end are provided in.

field_name_informal_classification.label: Field name (informal classification)
field_name_informal_classification.description: Taxonomy (field name) Informal classification of sample.

field_program_cruise.label: Field program/cruise
field_program_cruise.description: Name or identifier of the field program (cruise or expedition), during which the sample was collected
notes: For ship cruises, we recommended using the R2R Cruise ID at http://www.rvdata.us/catalog

geological_age.label: Geological Age
geological_age.description: Age of a sample as described by the stratigraphic  era, period, state, etc.

geological_unit.label: Geological unit
geological_unit.description: A body of rock established as a distinct entity in the classification of the Earth‚Äôs rocks, e.g. Supergroup, Group, Formation, or Flow

igsn.label: IGSN
igsn.description: Leave blank if you want SESAR to assign the IGSN.

latitude.label: Latitude
latitude.description: Latitude of the location where the sample was collected. (Coordinate system: WGS 84). (‚ÄòStart latitude‚Äô for linear sampling features such as dredges.) Needs to be entered in decimal degrees. Negative values for South latitudes.
notes: Please supply no more than 6 decimal places (meter scale resolution) in the actual number (not just display format.) No letters are allowed.

latitude_end.label: Latitude (end)
latitude_end.description: End latitude of the location where the sample was collected. (Coordinate system: WGS 84)
notes: Please supply no more than 6 decimal places (meter scale resolution) in the actual number (not just display format.) No letters are allowed.

launch_id.label: Launch ID
launch_id.description: Further identifying information about the launch

launch_platform_name.label: Launch platform name
launch_platform_name.description: The name of the launch used to collect the sample.

launch_type.label: Launch type
launch_type.description: The type of launch used to collect the sample.

locality.label: Locality
locality.description: Name of the specific place where your sample was collected. This could be the  name of a mine, a volcanic field, a vent field, or similar

locality_description.label: Locality description
locality_description.description: Additional information about the specific place where your sample was collected

location_description.label: Location description
location_description.description: Free text description of the location

longitude.label: Longitude
longitude.description: Longitude of the location where the sample was collected. (Coordinate system: WGS 84). (‚ÄòStart longitude‚Äô for linear sampling features such as dredges.) Needs to be entered in decimal degrees. Negative values for ‚ÄòWest‚Äô longitudes.

longitude_end.label: Longitude (end)
longitude_end.description: End longitude of the location where the sample was collected. (Coordinate system: WGS 84).

material.label: Material
material.description: Material that the sample consists of. Mandatory.

name_of_physiographic_feature.label: Name of physiographic feature
name_of_physiographic_feature.description: Name of the physiographic feature that you entered

northing.label: Northing
northing.description: Geographic Cartesian coordinate of where the sample was collected, in meters, as in UTM. "4111279‚Äù
notes: To be geolocated in the SESAR system, latitude and longitude must be filled out. UTM coordinates can be specified for reference but will not place the sample on the map. There are several web tools for converting from UTM to latitude/longitude, such as http://www.earthpoint.us/Convert.aspx.

original_archive.label: Original archive
original_archive.description: Name of institution, museum, or repository where the sample was originally stored.

original_archive_contact.label: Original archive contact
original_archive_contact.description: Address and/or email of the person who should be contacted for information about the sample‚Äôs original archive.

other_names.label: Other Name(s)
other_names.description: Other name(s) used for the sample.
notes: Provide multiple other names in a semi-colon delimited fashion.

parent_igsn.label: Parent IGSN
parent_igsn.description: Leave blank if a parent IGSN does not exist.

platform_description.label: Platform description
platform_description.description: Description of the platform for the cruise.

platform_name.label: Platform name
platform_name.description: Name of platform for the cruise.

platform_type.label: Platform type
platform_type.description: Type of platform for the cruise.

primary_physiographic_feature.label: Primary physiographic feature
primary_physiographic_feature.description: Type of physical feature that your sample was collected from

purpose.label: Purpose
purpose.description: Free text to describe the collection purpose of the sample, e.g.

related_url.label: Related url
related_url.description: Related URL associated with the samples

related_url_type.label: Related URL Type
related_url_type.description: Related URL type. Either DOI or Regular URL

related_url_description.label: Related URL Description
related_url_description.description: Free text description of the related URL

release_date.label: Release date
release_date.description: Date when sample metadata is publicly accessible and searchable. If null, defaults to date of registration (recommended).
notes: SESAR recommends that sample metadata become public within 2 years of sample registration.

sample_description.label: Sample Description
sample_description.description: Free text to describe features of a sample such as its components, texture, color, shape, etc.

size.label: Size
size.description: Size of the registered object, such as the dimension of a specimen, the length of a core, or the weight of a dredge

size_unit.label: Size unit
size_unit.description: Unit for the numerical value provided for ‚Äòsize‚Äô.

state_province.label: State/Province
state_province.description: State or Province where the sample was collected

sub_object_type.label: Sub-object type
sub_object_type.description: More descriptive Object Type. This applies only to samples with Object Type set to Individual Sample or Experimental Specimen.

vertical_datum.label: Vertical Datum
vertical_datum.description: Vertical datum used to calculate the elevation

zone.label: Zone
zone.description: Zone for the geographic Cartesian coordinate "11R"
notes: UTM zone, use a number from 1 to 60, followed by a letter between A and Z to specify UTM zone with no spaces in between. Letter must be capitalized.

grouped.label: header
grouped.description: Fields in the header section of the sample spreadsheet

grouped.label: Description
grouped.description: Fields which describe the overall sample event

grouped.label: Geolocation
grouped.description: Fields which describe the sample collection location

grouped.label: Curation
grouped.description: Fields which describe the curation of the sample
